ai-patthana21.13:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.13:0.3_0: Talking on the side of the profitable,
ai-patthana21.13:3.1_0: Not incompetent states, without a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.13:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.13:5.1_0: There are three kinds of unprofitableness that isn’t skilled in profitable way for three ways, full of unprofitableness, and uncomprehended.
ai-patthana21.13:8.1_0: or a thought associated with mind. ...
ai-patthana21.13:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:10.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:12.1_0: or unskillful thoughts are not a condition for the sake of mind.
ai-patthana21.13:12.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:14.1_0: They don’t give rise to a thought of thought, ‘... for the skillful.’
ai-patthana21.13:14.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:16.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:18.1_0: or mind consciousness in the sense of mental preoccupations, mind gives rise to unprofitable thoughts.
ai-patthana21.13:18.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:20.1_0: or mind is produced by mental preoccupations, nor by mind, nor by unprofitable thoughts.
ai-patthana21.13:20.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:22.1_0: or mind occupied by the mind, caused by mental exertion, or by mental exertion, conditions and thoughts arise by cause or reasoning their minds.
ai-patthana21.13:22.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:24.1_0: Not by reciting a teaching is a good principle.
ai-patthana21.13:24.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.13:26.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise or skillful.
ai-patthana21.13:28.1_0: Not grasping does not give rise to unskillful qualities, or skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.13:28.1_1: This is the section in brief.
